title: WeatherPro
description: A web-based weather application providing real-time forecasts, hourly and weekly weather insights, and location-based updates using OpenWeatherMap API integration.

title: Apple Website Clone
description: A frontend clone replicating Appleâ€™s official website layout, styling, and responsive structure to practice advanced HTML and CSS design implementation techniques.

title: Figma Clone
description: A browser-based design editor built with modular ES6 architecture featuring drawing tools, layer management, resizing, state management, and export functionality for scalable UI design experimentation.

title: Notes Manager
description: A full-stack notes management application allowing users to create, edit, and manage personal notes with frontend and backend integration for CRUD-based data persistence.

title: User Card Generator
description: A small full-stack project that dynamically generates user profile cards using form inputs and backend processing to render customizable identity cards for demonstration purposes.

title: Cyberfiction Website
description: A frontend visual storytelling website demonstrating animated image sequences and interactive layout elements designed to create immersive cyber-fiction themed presentation experiences.
